name: Lookup arguments benchmarks
description: Will introduce some concepts related to Lasso and GKR and then introduce some benchmark results between multiple lookup arguments.

speakers.name: Dohoon Kim
speakers.bio: Currently researching lookup arguments and implementing lookup arguments like Lasso inside halo2 backend. Previously, I implemented stark-verifier that verifier Plonky2 proof inside halo2 proving system.

speakers.name: Soowon Jeong
speakers.bio: Researcher in EF PSE, built proof of concepts about cryptographic primitives and systems such as GKR. Now working on DSL and tooling for ZK. Prior to working at Ethereum Foundation, worked as a programming language developer.
